bibl.title: F. Terrasi e P.A. Mandò, The Artemidorus Papyrus: Solving an Ancient Puzzle with Radiocarbon and Ion Beam Analysis Measurements. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Introduction: The Artemidorus Papyrus. - Materials and methods. - Conclusions. - "The ink used was carbon-based, just like the ink typically used in Greek and Roman times."
bibl.seg: Fedi M.E., L. Carraresi, N. Grassi, A. Migliori, F. Taccetti, F. Terrasi e P.A. Mandò, The Artemidorus Papyrus: Solving an Ancient Puzzle with Radiocarbon and Ion Beam Analysis Measurements. Avec résumé en anglais.
Radiocarbon [University of Arizona] 52 (2010) pp. 356-363, 5 figg. n./bl. et coul.
Introduction: The Artemidorus Papyrus. - Materials and methods. - Conclusions. - "The ink used was carbon-based, just like the ink typically used in Greek and Roman times."
Fedi Carraresi Grassi Migliori Taccetti Terrasi Mandò
